subject: Re: Order #SSN3259, how did it go?
description_text:
Buenas tardes
Aún no he recibido los artículos que compré.

El jue, 27 nov 2025 14:39, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:

> Hello Luis, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
